snippet: The Yankees, who had been floundering and just finished a hard-fought series against Detroit, beat the last-place Blue Jays for their third win in a row.
abstract: New York Yankees earn a 10-4 victory over the Toronto Blue Jays.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees, who had been floundering and just finished a hard-fought series against Detroit, beat the last-place Blue Jays for their third win in a row.

headline.seo: Yankees Beat Blue Jays After Tense Series vs. Tigers
headline.main: Yankees Use Blue Jays to Continue Turnaround
headline.print_headline: Yanks Use Blue Jays To Continue Turnaround
